titleStmt.title: G. W. Owen et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5746

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Frankfort Ky Aug 31st 1864
To His
Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlett
Govenor of Ky

We the undersigned petioners respectfully ask that a fine of Fifteen Dollars which was assessed against W. T. Moore in the Frankfort Police Court in the name of the Commonwealth of Ky against the Said W. T. Moore on November 1st 1863 for breach of the Peace be remited

G. W. Owen
Wm A Gaines
James T. Duvall
Saml. C Bull
R R Bolling
J C Coleman
G W Gwin
James Harlan Jr
A W Vallandingham
J Willis Graham
A. J. Graham
W. Stephens
Jno T. Steffee
J H Garrard
C F Ford
W. H. Hammon
M, B, Chinn
Thos. J. Jett
Saml Pepper
Lewis B Crutcher -
J. M. Mills.
G. W. Miller
Ed. Keenon
J B Temple
Jas W Batchelor
W. B. Poleman
Geo. B. Macklin
A. G. Cammack

Police Ct Frankfort
vs
W. T. Moore
$15 -- Â
Assault
Remit
31st Aug/64
